messages.content: You are a meeting analyst. Based on the meeting state, decide the single most important action. Respond with JSON: {"action":"name","params":{...},"reasoning":"why"}

Meeting: Cross-Team Sync | Domain: engineering
Key points: Frontend team discussing UX; Backend team discussing API versioning
Audio: 'While frontend handles the UX redesign, backend should start the API v2 migration. Both need to be ready by month end.'

{"action": "extract_action_item", "params": {"owner": "Backend team", "task": "Start API v2 migration", "deadline": "end of month", "priority": "high"}, "reasoning": "Two parallel tracks mentioned. API v2 migration is the higher-risk item to track."}
You are a meeting analyst. Based on the meeting state, decide the single most important action. Respond with JSON: {"action":"name","params":{...},"reasoning":"why"}

Meeting: Debate In Progress | Domain: product
Key points: Meeting content so far is minimal or non-actionable
Audio: 'I disagree. I think approach B is better because...' 'But what about the cost?'

{"action": "continue_observing", "params": {"reason": "Two team members debating approaches. No resolution yet, let it play out."}, "reasoning": "No action needed: Two team members debating approaches. No resolution yet, let"}
You are a meeting analyst. Based on the meeting state, decide the single most important action. Respond with JSON: {"action":"name","params":{...},"reasoning":"why"}

Meeting: Email Campaign | Domain: product
Key points: Blog and social assigned but email sequence has no owner
Audio: 'The email campaign is important but we did not really resolve it'

{"action": "flag_gap", "params": {"topic": "Email Campaign", "gap_type": "no_owner", "suggestion": "Assign someone for email campaign before feature launch"}, "reasoning": "Blog and social assigned but email sequence has no owner"}
You are a meeting analyst. Based on the meeting state, decide the single most important action. Respond with JSON: {"action":"name","params":{...},"reasoning":"why"}

Meeting: Legal Risk | Domain: product
Key points: Team adding user tracking features without privacy policy update
Recent discussion suggests a potential oversight

{"action": "provide_insight", "params": {"insight": "New tracking features may require privacy policy and cookie consent updates. Run this by legal before shipping to avoid compliance issues.", "category": "risk"}, "reasoning": "Surfacing risk: Legal risk"}
You are a meeting analyst. Based on the meeting state, decide the single most important action. Respond with JSON: {"action":"name","params":{...},"reasoning":"why"}

Meeting: Sprint Planning | Domain: engineering
Key points: Payment system needs fix and docs need update
Audio: 'Mike will fix the payment bug and Sarah will update the docs by Friday'

{"action": "extract_action_item", "params": {"owner": "Mike", "task": "Fix payment system bug", "deadline": "Friday", "priority": "high"}, "reasoning": "Payment bug is higher priority than docs. Sarah's task will be captured in next cycle."}
You are a meeting analyst. Based on the meeting state, decide the single most important action. Respond with JSON: {"action":"name","params":{...},"reasoning":"why"}

Meeting: Asking Questions | Domain: product
Key points: Meeting content so far is minimal or non-actionable
Audio: 'What exactly do you mean by real-time? Sub-second? Or within 5 seconds?'

{"action": "continue_observing", "params": {"reason": "Someone asking clarifying questions. Information gathering phase."}, "reasoning": "No action needed: Someone asking clarifying questions. Information gathering p"}
You are a meeting analyst. Based on the meeting state, decide the single most important action. Respond with JSON: {"action":"name","params":{...},"reasoning":"why"}

Meeting: Pricing Strategy | Domain: sales
Key points: Discussed enterprise pricing but could not agree on amount
Audio: 'We need to figure out enterprise pricing but let us move on for now'

{"action": "flag_gap", "params": {"topic": "Enterprise pricing decision", "gap_type": "no_decision", "suggestion": "Prepare pricing proposals with competitive analysis for next meeting"}, "reasoning": "Enterprise pricing was discussed but no decision was reached \u2014 this is a gap"}
You are a meeting analyst. Based on the meeting state, decide the single most important action. Respond with JSON: {"action":"name","params":{...},"reasoning":"why"}

Meeting: Agenda Review | Domain: general
Key points: Meeting content so far is minimal or non-actionable
Audio: 'OK let me go through the agenda. First we have..'

Meeting: Budget Review | Domain: operations
Key points: Expenses reviewed but no discussion of cost optimization opportunities
Tracked: Multiple items already logged
Consecutive observations without action: 2

{"action": "suggest_next_step", "params": {"suggestion": "Review top 3 cost centers for optimization opportunities before next quarter", "reason": "Proactive cost review prevents budget overruns"}, "reasoning": "Proactive suggestion: Review top 3 cost centers for optimization opportunities bef"}
You are a meeting analyst. Based on the meeting state, decide the single most important action. Respond with JSON: {"action":"name","params":{...},"reasoning":"why"}

Meeting: Quarterly Roadmap | Domain: product
Key points: Product roadmap with feature priorities, timelines, and resource allocation
Whiteboard: Detailed notes visible
Audio: 'I think we have enough to write this up.'

{"action": "request_artifact", "params": {"artifact_type": "impl_plan", "context_summary": "Q3: Dark mode (2 weeks), Export (3 weeks), API v2 (4 weeks). 2 engineers + 1 designer.", "domain": "product"}, "reasoning": "Team has enough context to generate impl_plan"}
You are a meeting analyst. Based on the meeting state, decide the single most important action. Respond with JSON: {"action":"name","params":{...},"reasoning":"why"}

Meeting: Design System | Domain: product
Key points: Discussed options; Team evaluated alternatives
Audio: 'Let us go with that. Adopt Material Design 3 as design system.'

{"action": "log_decision", "params": {"decision": "Adopt Material Design 3 as design system", "alternatives_rejected": ["Custom design system", "Bootstrap"], "rationale": "Faster development with Google ecosystem"}, "reasoning": "Firm decision made: Adopt Material Design 3 as design system"}
You are a meeting analyst. Based on the meeting state, decide the single most important action. Respond with JSON: {"action":"name","params":{...},"reasoning":"why"}

Meeting: Product Roadmap | Domain: product

Tracked: Multiple items already logged
Consecutive observations without action: 2

You are a meeting analyst. Based on the meeting state, decide the single most important action. Respond with JSON: {"action":"name","params":{...},"reasoning":"why"}

Meeting: Market Focus | Domain: product
Key points: Discussed options; Team evaluated alternatives
Audio: 'After considering everything, enterprise-first strategy starting q3.'

{"action": "log_decision", "params": {"decision": "Enterprise-first strategy starting Q3", "alternatives_rejected": ["SMB focus", "Hybrid approach"], "rationale": "Enterprise shows 3x more profitability"}, "reasoning": "Firm decision made: Enterprise-first strategy starting Q3"}
You are a meeting analyst. Based on the meeting state, decide the single most important action. Respond with JSON: {"action":"name","params":{...},"reasoning":"why"}

Meeting: Timing Risk | Domain: product
Key points: Planning major redesign launch the week before holiday season
Recent discussion suggests a potential oversight

{"action": "provide_insight", "params": {"insight": "Launching major changes before holidays means reduced support staff during peak user activity. Consider launching 2 weeks post-holiday.", "category": "risk"}, "reasoning": "Surfacing risk: Timing risk"}
You are a meeting analyst. Based on the meeting state, decide the single most important action. Respond with JSON: {"action":"name","params":{...},"reasoning":"why"}

Meeting: Market Context | Domain: sales
Key points: Team preparing proposal with 10% discount for new enterprise client

{"action": "provide_insight", "params": {"insight": "Similar enterprise deals last quarter averaged 15% discount to close. Consider whether 10% is competitive enough for this segment.", "category": "context"}, "reasoning": "Surfacing context: Market context"}
